Mixboard | Founding Engineer | San Francisco | Onsite | http://mixboard.com

Mixboard is a visual collaboration board for teams to organize their research, documents, designs and sheets in one easy place.

Right now we're a small team and looking for a founding engineer. This is the perfect opportunity if you're looking to wear many hats and take on difficult technical challenges. Familiarity with React, Ruby on Rails and Postgres is a plus.

Previously I was on the founding team at 4 successfully acquired startups, most notably Vurb that was acquired by Snap Inc. for $115M.
